name: Stern Pinball Arcade
description:
Stern Pinball Arcade is the most realistic and accurate pinball game ever created!

Stern Pinball Inc® has created many of the all-time greatest pinball tables. They are the most experienced and largest producer of real pinball machines in business today! Modern classics in this collection include:

Ghostbusters™ Premium
Star Trek™ Vengeance Premium
Mustang® Premium "Boss"
Harley-Davidson® / Third Edition
Last Action Hero™
Mary Shelley's Frankenstein™
Starship Troopers™
High Roller Casino™
Ripley's Believe it or Not!®
Phantom of the Opera™
ratingContent: Very mild themes and coarse language
